original_text: And I will bring the sword on you to avenge the breaking of the covenant. When you withdraw into your cities, I will send a plague among you, and you will be given into enemy hands.
korean_text: 내가 칼을 너희에게로 가져다가 언약을 어긴 원수를 갚을 것이며 너희가 성읍에 모일지라도 너희 중에 염병을 보내고 너희를 대적의 손에 넘길 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will bring the sword on you
to avenge the breaking of the covenant
When you withdraw into your cities
I will send a plague among you
and you will be given into enemy hands
